properties.areaDesc: Chesapeake Bay north of Pooles Island MD; Chester River to Queenstown MD; Patapsco River including Baltimore Harbor; Chesapeake Bay from Pooles Island to Sandy Point MD
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 6 at 2:25AM EST until February 7 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt expected.

* WHERE...Chesapeake Bay north of Sandy Point MD, Patapsco River
including Baltimore Harbor, and Chester River to Queenstown MD.

* WHEN...From 11 AM to 6 PM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 6 PM EST FRIDAY
